channel.title: Run-Time Error Help please!
channel.description:
I get this when i run my server. Not in compiler:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3 at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:4108) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:37) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:69) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Run-Time Error Help please!
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

I was editting in it and i reverted back to the original file. what do you suppose the issue could be?
